trans-unit.source: Specifies the paper tray from which the printer gets paper.
trans-unit.target: 指定给打印机送纸的纸盒。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to get the paper source trays that are available on the printer and to set the paper source for a page, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此类由<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以获取本文源可用在打印机上并分别设置页上，纸张来源的盘子。

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: 打印有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPaperSource` combo box with the printer's supported paper sources.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例填充`comboPaperSource`支持的组合框与打印机纸张来源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>被标识为提供有关通过将要添加的项的显示字符串的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性的组合框。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>变量名为`printDoc`存在以及是否存在特定的组合框。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> 类的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper source.
trans-unit.target: 获取纸张来源。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the integer representing one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind" /> values or a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind" /> 值之一或自定义值的整数。

trans-unit.source: The integer value representing one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind" /> values or a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind" /> 值之一或自定义值的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows integer value for each <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> member.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示每个整数值<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>成员。

trans-unit.source: Anything larger than 256 maps to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom> in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> enumeration, but the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.RawKind%2A> property returns the actual integer value.
trans-unit.target: 任何大于 256 映射到<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>中<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>枚举，但<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.RawKind%2A>属性返回的实际整数值。

trans-unit.source: Integer value
trans-unit.target: 整数值

trans-unit.source: PaperSourceKind member
trans-unit.target: PaperSourceKind 成员

trans-unit.source: 256 or larger
trans-unit.target: 256 或更大

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the paper source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置纸张来源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the paper source.
trans-unit.target: 纸张来源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Call this property when the paper source needs to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当需要显示纸张来源时，请调用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the paper source is generated based upon the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 纸张源的名称生成基于<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPaperSource` combo box with the printer's supported paper sources.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例填充`comboPaperSource`支持的组合框与打印机纸张来源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>被标识为提供有关通过将要添加的项的显示字符串的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性的组合框。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>变量名为`printDoc`存在以及是否存在特定的组合框。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource" /> in string form.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式提供有关 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource" /> 的信息。

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串。
